programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Vulco - O Apocalipse, (2014, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Quando um ex-comandante das Operaes Especiais visita Pompia, sua esposa e filha ficam presas no Monte. O Vesvio entra em erupo com fora macia.

programme.title: Alm do Horizonte, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Com Frank Grillo. Um talentoso policial embarca em uma busca incansvel para libertar seu filho de uma nave aliengena.

programme.title: Pnico em Seattle, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma grande tempestade ameaa o noroeste do Pacfico, uma famlia deve se encontrar e trabalhar junta para acabar com a tempestade antes que ela se espalhe alm de seu controle e aniquile o planeta!

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Transformers: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Mais uma vez, a Terra apanhada no meio quando a ressurreio de um antigo Transformer parece virar a mar para os Autobots na sua longa guerra com os malvados Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: A Era da Extino, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Com a humanidade encarando a extino por uma nova ameaa, depende de Optimus e Autobots salvar o mundo. Mas agora que o nosso governo virou-se contra eles, precisaro de uma nova equipe de aliados.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: A Hospedeira, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: A Lmina Fatal, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: Dorian Tan Tao-liang, estudante Shaolin, busca traidor Manchu que matou o abade. Jackie Chan, especialista em lana, ajuda-o. Misso: proteger estudioso dos Manchus.

programme.title: Cemitrio Maldito, (1989, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Para a maioria das famlia, mudar-se um novo comeo. Mas para os Creeds, ele pode ser o comeo do fim.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Os Jovens Pistoleiros, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: 1878 no Novo Mxico: John Tunstall recolhe jovens pistoleiros da estrada e os leva para trabalhar em seu rancho, mas tambm os ensina a ler e a ser civilizados. Porm, ele uma pedra no sapato do rico fazendeiro Murphy, um concorrente na venda de gado.

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Um Tira da Pesada 3, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Axel Foley viaja de volta a Beverly Hills para um passeio emocionante de montanha-russa no parque de diverses Wonderworld! Acompanhado pelos velhos amigos Billy Rosewood e Serge, Axel se torna a nova atrao enquanto persegue os bandidos.

programme.title: Chuva Negra, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Nick Conklin e Charlie Vincent so dois detetives da polcia de Nova York que precisam escoltar um assassino at o Japo. Mas o preso escapa e, para captura-lo, eles acabam se envolvendo em uma guerra entre gangues rivais da mfia japonesa.

programme.title: Police Story: A Guerra das Drogas, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Ka Kui (Jackie Chan) prende um chefe do crime, mas a secretria o trai para libert-lo. Alm disso, ele lida com a namorada ciumenta.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: Salomo, (1997, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Aps a morte do rei Davi, seu filho Salomo torna-se o novo Rei de Israel. Famoso por sua sabedoria, justia e amor adorado por seu povo e pelos visitantes que vm de todas as partes do mundo.

programme.title: Davi, (1997, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: De um simples pastor a um poderoso rei, Davi, com muita coragem e f, comanda o reino de Israel por muitos anos e deixa seu nome na Histria.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: Camp (Lio de Vida), (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Aps se inscrever em um programa de monitores de um acampamento filantrpico de vero, um consultor de investimentos tenta ajudar um menino de dez anos de idade a entender o significado do amor incondicional.

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Inspirational Drama)

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Romance)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary, (2004, Romance)

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Hudson Hawk, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Willis is Eddie "The Hawk" Hawkins, the world's most famous cat burglar, who, after 10 years in prison, is ready to go straight. But it's not going to be easy for The Hawk.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Crime)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Carrie, (1976, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this all-time horror classic, Carrie (Sissy Spacek) is a loner with no confidence and no friends. When pushed too far, Carrie becomes a vengeance-seeking powerhouse who causes all hell to break loose in a frenzy of blood, fire and brimstone!

programme.title: King Kong, (1976, Adventure)
programme.desc: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Marathon Man, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman plays the likable graduate student and marathon runner of the title, unwillingly trapped in a killing game of intrigue involving a Nazi fugitive, Christian Szell.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren't able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time Limit Closes in! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he'll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks' thirst for revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!

programme.title: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy's response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!

programme.title: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: The Mummy, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz star in this nonstop action epic about the discovery of a long-lost treasure in the Egyptian desert that also unearths a 3,000-year-old legacy of terror!

programme.title: The Mummy Returns, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and an all-star cast reunite in this action-packed adventure where an accursed mummy is resurrected along with a force even more powerful: The Scorpion King (The Rock).

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Life, (2017, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A team of scientists whose mission of discovery aboard the International Space Station turns into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life-form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: The Big Trees, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas stars in this Warner Bros drama as a ruthless lumber baron fighting for land in Northern California redwood country.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prisonin the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Wagons East!, (1994, Comedy)

programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: O Chamado de Xangai
programme.desc: Um advogado de Nova York enviado a Xangai a negcios e logo enfrenta muitos problemas com a lei.

programme.title: Terapia do Sexo
programme.desc: Um viciado em sexo em recuperao tenta cortejar uma nova namorada que sente a necessidade de expressar sua intensa sexualidade.

programme.desc: Andy Conners no faz ideia de como satisfazer as necessidades sexuais de sua namorada, Lauren Baker. Ele pede conselhos a seus amigos e a uma famosa atriz porno.

programme.title: A Servio de Sara
programme.desc: Sara Moore recebe os papis do divrcio e percebe que corre o risco de perder milhes. Ela convence o oficial de justia Joe Tyler a ajud-la a lidar com seu ex-marido e, para isso, fazem juntos uma viagem pelo pas.

programme.title: Qual seu nmero?
programme.desc: Ally quer encontrar o melhor ex-namorado que j teve com medo de nunca mais amar de verdade.

programme.desc: Um casal tem uma grande surpresa quando sua filha anuncia seu casamento no dia da sua boda de prata.

programme.desc: Will Keane um playboy cinquento que tem como promessa nunca ter um compromisso srio com uma mulher. Quando ele conhece Charlotte Fielding ,imagina que ter com ela outro rpido e fcil romance. Mas nada no relacionamento de ambos fcil ou rpido.

programme.title: Uma Viagem Para Paris
programme.desc: Lucas, um rico empresrio francs, vai a Montana para uma proposta de negcio muito atraente. L, ele conhece Robin, se apaixona e a leva para Paris em uma incrvel aventura de Natal. Mas ser que os negcios acabaro com esse romance?

programme.title: Um romance proibido
programme.desc: Um veterano tenta se assimilar de volta vida civil em um pas que ele mal reconhece enquanto tenta conquistar o corao de uma imigrante iraquiana, mas esse romance improvvel posto prova quando ela se depara com a perspectiva de deportao.

programme.title: Festividades do Chocolate Quente
programme.desc: Colette dirige uma cafetaria conhecida pelo seu chocolate quente secreto e famoso. Marcus, um novo dono de sobremesa, comea a atrair os clientes da Colette, ela est determinada a exp-lo.

programme.title: Amor rio acima
programme.desc: Charlotte, autora de Chicago, viaja para a regio selvagem de Minnesota para escrever um novo livro. Seu guia, Rob, duvida das habilidades de Charlotte. No entanto, eles percebem que tm mais coisas em comum e acabam se apaixonando.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar antiga.

programme.title: Lar Doce Lar ... Ou no
programme.desc: Victoria Tremont, entediada com a vida, quer encontrar algum especial. Um estranho entra na cafeteria e no responde ao seu charme. Ela descobre que ele dirige um ministrio de moradias e decide se voluntariar, mesmo que precise mentir.

programme.title: A Grande Guerra
programme.desc: Durante os ltimos dias da Primeira Guerra Mundial, um grupo de soldados dos EUA enviado para trs das linhas inimigas para resgatar um peloto perdido.

programme.title: Promessas de Guerra
programme.desc: Joshua Connor perdeu seus trs filhos na batalha de Galpoli, em 1919. Ele recebe ento a ajuda de Ayshe, uma mulher que est espera do marido, enviado para aguerra, e de seu filho, o pequeno Orhan.

programme.title: Premonies
programme.desc: Linda Hanson uma mulher suburbana que um dia avisada que seu marido, Jim, morreu em um terrvel desastre automobilstico. Porm, ao acordar no dia seguinte, tudo est perfeitamente normal em sua vida e Jim est vivo.

programme.title: O ltimo Guarda-Costas
programme.desc: O gngster Mitchell decide mudar de profisso ao sair da priso e abandonar o mundo do crime. Ele contratado como segurana de Charlotte, uma complicada jovem atriz que tenta levar uma vida reclusa.

programme.title: Tormenta

programme.title: O Duelo
programme.desc: Um Ranger do Texas est investigando uma srie de mortes inexplicveis em uma cidade chamada Helena.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, comea uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Por uns Dlares a Mais
programme.desc: Monco um astuto caador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Se Encontrar Sartana, Reze pela sua Morte
programme.desc: O lendrio heri Sartana chamado para investigar uma srie de roubos e assassinatos, que levam a consequncias surpreendentes.

programme.desc: Juan Miranda um campons rude com corao de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory um revolucionrio irlands que especialista em dinamite e vive agora no Mxico.

programme.title: Que Assim Seja, Trinity
programme.desc: Um aventureiro protege um garoto que herdou um terreno sob o qual h um rico campo de petrleo. O menino ameaado por viles perigosos que querem prejudic-lo e tomar a terra.

programme.title: A Sala dos Espelhos
programme.desc: Mendigo se torna DJ de uma rdio de extrema direita em Nova Orleans, at descobrir as intenes obscuras da estao.

programme.desc: O tenente Caldwell e o inspetor de polcia Jay Austin no se bicam. Nem um pouco. Isso porque Caldwell ajudou a expulsar Austin da polcia militar h alguns anos.

programme.desc: Este confronto clssico entre o bem e o mal estrelado por Kevin Costner , Robert De Niro e Sean Connery , o policial que ensina Ness a vencer a multido: atirar rpido e atirar primeiro.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica
programme.desc: Jet Li Wong Fei-Hong, heri chins que vai Amrica, salvo por ndios e luta contra a explorao de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: A Fuga
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Foras do Mal
programme.desc: Cinco histrias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rdio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de voc
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradveis que indicam que algo est errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, h manchas em sua pele e ele tem vises que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da fico.

programme.title: Pginas da Morte
programme.desc: Quando um mdico psiquiatra pesquisa um dirio de meninas para descobrir por que ela assassinou toda a sua famlia, ele comea a cair no mesmo estado de insnia e confuso que a levou a perder a cabea

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas razes de um velho carvalho acidentalmente solto no Dia de So Patrcio. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingana sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubares
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se v isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles so forados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espcies cada vez mais mortais de tubaro.

programme.title: Busca de Vingana
